Perceptor:

Perceptor laughted devilish and he started to read the results and 
typed some datums in your computer "Well, well Maxima"sair 
Percepor"It seems that the basic regist that have a copy of your 
beast form it undamaged but your shell... It's other story. Repair 
your shel it's a option but regarding that Rodimus and that Windlord 
liked kill you, you should better consider upgrade it. I can do that 
you be a fuzzor: a bot with two beast modes mixed in one..." 
Perceptor typed some holoproyector and showed a fuzzor that mixed a 
hawk and tiger. "He was Tigerhawk" said Perceptor"One of the most 
powerful Maxis in Beast wars, do you like to have your old one body 
or use this fashion with Upgrades....?"









--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/21/03 1:35:48 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Yessss, yesss"hissed Proudly Perceptor"But remember that Hydras 
> > hasn't commanded her death... So by now she's a Predacon more 
but 
> > I'm a bit worried: Maximals might do an attempt to rescue her 
soon 
> > and I'm afraid that she isn't able to take herself... I wonder 
great 
> > Maxima"said Perceptor while he looked to her eyes"If you would 
train 
> > her... Don't worry she doesn't remember that she' was once a 
maximal 
> > or Rodimus's love, and a little trick will kill her if someone 
> > beyond me try to reprograme her... I just have the key to shut 
up 
> > the program that destroy her spark in case that Maximals try to 
> > reprogram her... I wonder if you can do me that little favor..."
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> A weak, barely noticable smirk crossed her face. "Indeed. I accept 
that 
> challenge," as her memory dashed back many years to another whom 
actually 
> took to her as a mentor, a certain Earth robot. Even going as far 
as giving 
> the bot a slightly new form that can transform... as well as 
protecting her. 
> So many she had 'guarded' over the millenia. Each of them were a 
rare case. 
> 
> The opportunity again was something she would enjoy. Already, she 
> contemplated ways to turn the reporgrammed bot into one of on of 
the few in 
> history to be a more than lethal Decepticon fembot. 'She'll be 
more than just 
> Blackstorm,' she thought. 'She'll end up to be Rodimus' 
destruction!'
